place_name: Charlotte Mecklenburg Library | University City Regional
place_description: Charlotte Mecklenburg Library is the library system serving Mecklenburg County, NC with 20 locations and a digital online site. Our mission is to improve lives and build a stronger community. We create a community of readers and empower individuals.

reviews_data.review_text: Very good library. Staff is very knowledgeable. Book collection is very good. We can also order from other location as well for hold. Lot of activities for kids. Ample parking onsite. After hours book drop available. Easy checkout available.
It's a great place for the kids,love the story time. Very nice volunteers and staff. Various activities like coloring and computer games. Many books to choose from. Absolutely LOVE it!
It's great, I love reading there and the various books I can read from. Definitely a great library(one of my faves)
Convenient location but rude inpatient staff
Is quiet and wonderful

Esta biblioteca me trae hermosos recuerdos. Siempre que llevaba a mis ninas cuando estaban pequenitas disfrutaba mucho sumergirse en los libros. Esta con facilidad para ejercer el voto local. Tienen siempre eventos y te dejan saber a traves de correo electronicos cuando seran los mismos.

The library has changed since I last visited. Both locations (University and Sugaw Creek) are spacious and ready for young minds to explore. I was very pleased with the quantity (number of staff) and their willingness to help (go the extra mile). The themes and upcoming events were well displayed... lots of eye catching information. I enjoyed looking around before checking out my book.

Brought my toddler here for story time. The leader acted like they HAD to sit down. Not all kids can sit down in one spot so it seems it would be appropriate to allow them to stand if they want. I usually go to the location on betties ford. The leader is great and does not make the kids sit if they don't want to. You can forget about it if you have a child with autism.
Great library and friendly stuffs.

Awesome. Wish this city would remodel this library instead of put our hard earned money in unless infrastructures like carving Street names in bridges!!! Libraries are way more important than a road!!

Always the idiots that are at the top.
Books always ready when I walk in to pick them up. Friendly people available to assist.
Great library, friendly, and helpful staff
Great library, very helpful staff

Friendly staff, plenty of parking and a really cool AARP tax prep service for seniors happening.
It's a lovely space with plenty of space and help foe whoever needs it.
The Community Book program offers free books each month to keep!! Nothing better then free books
It's a library
Went today to celebrate 30 years of this library!  Happy Anniversary!  Such a beautiful facility inside and out!

I recently started a project for myself where I am trying to read every part of Star Wars canon, EVER, and I am constantly amazed by how many books, comics, and audio books I can all get for free in print and ebook format. Hoopla has EVERYTHING! Right at my finger tips! I'm so happy to have all of these amazing resources.
Awesome library. It's spacious and so good for kids.

Esta biblioteca es hermosa, hacen diferentes actividades. Te sacas el carnet de la biblioteca y te prestan libros y tambien te pueden prestar laptop, este prestamo seria por una semana y en cuanto a los libros por 3 semanas aproximadamente. Es fabuloso este lugar, me encanta!!!
A library is suppose to be a quiet place for those of you who forgot. This is the loudest library I have ever been to in my life, no one respects that some people came to study!!!!

Clean , the staff (ALL) I myself had a lot of questions, needed a lot of help ... Everyone who helped me from the time I walked in to renew my card , until the time I left ... AWESOME STAFF , thank you all for helping me 12-08-2022 ....
Always clean, great staff who are always eager to answer questions. Our family enjoy going there all the time!
Great library
This library has helpful staff and plenty of great books.
Well maintained library. Love this place. I like how easy it is to checkout and return books.

Was there from 9:30 am to 11am. Had one guy on his cellphone with bill collectors for almost half an hour and a special need person grunting and rocking the entire time. When saw he was touching himself too, I left!! He was right next to the librarians desk. I'll never go back there again!!

Customer service is not good. I went to renew my books and was told I couldn't because I had two books out. THEY'RE HERE WITH ME?! I ended up simply putting one in the return box.. she "goes to look for it" for 5 Full minutes but "didn't see it"
IT WAS LITERALLY THE MOST RECENT BOOK PUT IN THE BOX

Then told me she was gonna renew the book that I still had in my hand.. she takes it from me, pulls my bookmark out and flips thru the pages
I'm like "I thought you said I can have this one back" then she says "oh"

You snatched my bookmark out and lost my place when I just had a few chapters left?! Ugh!!!!!!
I don't even want to read anything anymore

I just left the book with the lady since she had already irritated me

Will use another location from now on.

Friendly staff. The Mecklenburg library system seems to be well-organized, and this branch is always on top of things. I never had a problem getting a book that I had placed a hold on. They were also attentive to various COVID policies throughout the pandemic, which I appreciated.
Very nice and quiet. Able to do anything on your computer with confidence.

I've been living in the university area for YEARS and I have never been to this library until 2 months ago and now I can't stop going. Such an awesome facility, the staff is wonderful. It's so quiet, clean, I feel like a little kid again with all the books choices. Secure this place at all times.
This is an incredibly awesome library with extensive interiors. I come here with my boy. He enjoys a lot here. The library offers quality time here...

My family and I come here about every other Sunday. The staff is always friendly. Always well kept. Large kids section with kids tables. Lots of kids computers. Requesting books is simple and easy. Also, my daughter loves going each week because the staff puts together "craft bags" with the supplies to do a craft at home. She looks forward to seeing what craft is there each week.
There's also a section in the middle with books from several different languages.

This library is so so. The staff upon entry are super friendly and always greet me with a smile. The only negative thing I have to say is the staff toward the front (in the middle area) are so loud it's almost hard to study most days. You would think they would at least attempt to use inside voices considering they work in the library.
I love Libraries. Go in and get a book!!! Tell them P. Zach send you.
Great place to study. The staff is awesome !!!!!!!
I love that it is right up the street from where I live.
My habit is to put books on hold and pick them up when I get the automated telephone call. Very consistent process; I'm never disappointed. The staff is always friendly too.
They got the best book
Nice quiet spot to read or use computers
No way will I go back need to update systems
Great free library for kids

I am split on this. Yesterday, the 16th,while at the Library I had interactions with both the security officer and an extremely helpful lady in the resource center. I only wish I would of gotten her name. She was about 5'5, slender, beautiful black lady. She answered all my questions and was so patient. Today, when I went back, I was using the computer lab and again was struggling with an issue. Today, the lady that   was working, when I went to her for assistance, she appeared to not want to help me. After explaining what the problem was three times, I asked her if maybe she could just come and look at it. She made EVERY excuse to not come help, but finally agreed to. When we got into the Computer Lab, she stood so far back from the computer she seriously could not see what I was talking about. Both of us were wearing mask, so I can't think it was a "Covid " concern. I  finally just gave up. It was not worth getting frustrated over. Too bad I didn't get her name either, but her name badge was flipped backwards. She was about 5'3, white, and maybe mid-30s.
Alyx and Karina are both so helpful! Great staff and hoping for a larger location by the lake one day.
Is close by fun helpful staff is awesome, it's quite.
The stuff members in this location is always so helpful and have a smile to visitors.

This location is pretty drab. During the pandemic, they did not offer a way to pick up your holds curbside despite other library systems doing this (cue Cabarrus). I pay for my card since I am not a resident and will not be doing that again. I just went to pick up holds, since the only option is inside, and was barked at for not wearing a mask. We've been at this for 15 months now. The mask mandate has been lifted. If the vaccine works, why are you requiring people to wear masks? Why don't you have an option for pickup for people who can't or won't come inside? Inconvenient location. Hope it does close.
The best library I have been to in NC. Librarians are super helpful and friendly.
We went to use their computer, they have it separated for the Covid-19. But the associates are nice and I recommend checking out Mecklenburg Library.
I'm so happy that the library is reopened somewhat, I actually enjoy turning the pages of a book and now I can check out books again
We love the library, anytime we visited
Might as well just stay closed if you're just gonna have two ppl standing outside telling everyone they cant do anything
Always a great experience here  I love organised and neat it is especially during this covid time.
A couple of employees are really great.  Super glad they are open for pickup
Very nice and quiet library in the university area with lots of resources and things to do with little children.

Opens late
I'm surprise the library doesn't open at 8am
There are a few really great employees that are very helpful.

This is our home library and it is always busy! They do an excellent job with children's programming and my kids have loved attending various storytimes as they've aged from one to the next. I also appreciate the diverse book displays and intentional effort to represent children of color.
Hayley is a great librarian. The staff is always present. The books are always in the correct place. Everyone is always happy!

Very bleak front and inhospitable entrance for pedestrians (no sidewalk - you pretty much need to drive here). Once inside however the library opens up and has a friendly and helpful staff. There are tables in the rear with a view of the woods. An active children's section with kids playing and screeching along with a circulation fan that seems to clank along in its rotation means that the library isn't exactly an oasis of tranquility.
Nice Library. Great location. Was crowded on Saturday. The children's section needs to be closed in, they get a little rowdy and it's disturbing when you come there for some peace and QUIET!

The library is in a great location and is rather beautiful. The book selection is great, especially for children and teens. They also have a great amount of comic books. If you're coming here to sit and study, it can be a hit or miss, sometimes it will be rather empty and you'll be blessed with your own table, fast internet, and a quiet library, other times you'll have to share a desk (nothing wrong with that, just means you can't spread out as much), have to deal with somewhat slow internet speeds, and a bit more background noise. The staff is friendly and it's easy to head out and buy a drink and lunch and return to finish studying or whatnot. My biggest complaints are that there are not enough work spaces and the internet does not have enough bandwidth to handle the volume of traffic they get in the afternoons.
Very helpful staff and favorite study place...
Everyday this place is loud. Not a good place to be if you like it to be quiet. Kids constantly running around and screaming.

This library is amazing. It is huge and packed with lots of great books.  They have comfy study areas, beautiful grounds where they hold library events, and plenty of other things going on.  My kids loved visiting this library and always found lots of great books.  The staff is very friendly and helpful, happy to share recommendations.

Just fine at this time
Good
I am just see this library three times

Decent selection for a public library

Good play area for Kids

Bad Internet

Amazing people all around. Have fun activities for kids, teens, adults and all sort of ages. The best part they offer tutors for kid and teens help them on math or other subject in school. They are very helpful and a great place to learn and explore.
I have used this library since they have open I have nothing but good things about this library. They have most helpful and and friendly
This library is great. They have a wonderful children's section and great titles for adults. Although it stays busy, its always quiet and has lots of space.
I enjoy my visits, especially with the grandchildren.

The internet/ WiFi service is awfully. And one staff member States her suggestion was to go to another location.  Bad Customer Service.  The location is ideal. Its generally quiet.  The space is open, clean and safe.
The people are amazing and they always have the book(s) I'm looking for!
I really like this library! I love that the CharMeck network lets you request books from different branches, and they offer a lot of online sources (ebooks, music, etc).

I work from home so I usually go the library to get some quiet time.
My rating is only about the poor internet service. Seriously, it's horrible . I get better speed at McDonald. CMC needs to step up their game there. Other than that, the place is quiet, clean and the staff very friendly
I like this library because of the location, friendly staff and great books organization in the library. Also, they have very big kids play area, just there could be more educational toys.

This is a very good library

staff is very helpful

Baby story classes every Wednesday
Need to update Sunday Hours: Not open Memorial Day thru Labor Day
The service is better at other locations.
The service was good

You will be able to turn into the Library from the median if you're going East on WT Harris from Tryon. Just an FYI, because my Navi said I would need to go an extra half mile to do a U-turn. The bookstore has plenty of selections, and it has a friendly and helpful staff.
Good place for book lovers

Great selection, friendly staff.

The only complaint I have is I had a book overdue, by one day, for the first time and there was no leeway...
